text: When I ordered said 20-30min. I got there. Said just a few minutes more. After 30 minutes more. I called. Told me it had been picked up. Finally got my pizza. My wife and I like different so we order half and half. I picked 19 jalapenos off ‚Ä¶More

text: This location, on Kiowa Ave, has a very small dining area... which was vacant of customers when I went there [approx 6:30 p.m.] ... probably because it's cold outside right now [for most locals] & a week night. I think most of the business ‚Ä¶More

name: Duane Blackburn
text: This is the best pizza hut restaurant! Its main purpose is carry out or delivery, so they are equipped and efficient for making pizza very quickly. There is a small dining area in case you do want to dine in the restaurant, with clean restrooms. No soda fountain... only 2 liter soda bottles.

name: Nathan Batson
text: Best Pizza Hut in town.  Tony always makes sure my order us right.  They remember my name every time I stop by.  It's like seeing family.  Cant wait to go again.

text: Special Thanks to Krystal for her help with my order. She took the time to explain the online ordering process and awards. I can‚Äôt thank you enough for making my first experience a pleasant one.

text: They didnt put the pork on my pizza, no garlic buttery crust, and no ranch dipping sauce for my wings. Huge rip off. They just lost a customer, never ordering from there again.

name: Denise Suesov
text: Employees were very professional. Food was great. The only concern I had was on entering the place to order, I immediately smelled garbage. I've order pizza from here every time I am in Havasu and it has always been pleasant.. The tables were clean as well as the floors and counters.. It surprised me..

text: I have ordered like every week from this store and every week they NEVER SEEM to out the garlic butter sauce offered on their crustes even though I have i  have ordered it an it reflects that on my receipt. I feel mits worth the drive to go to Swanson they actually get your order right
